name: Johnny's Revenge
description:
JOHNNY'S REVENGE:

This game was created for a 72hr GameJam with the theme being "One Room"

The game is about Johnny who after feeling betrayed by everyone finally gets his revenge and has a shoot out.

Shoot the waves of enemies the Spawn into the one room.

Try to survive through all the waves.

Controls:

- Movement Keys: W, A, S, D

- Aim with Mouse Cursor

- Left Mouse Click to fire Weapon
